hyperaggregate.aggregation_profiles.abstract_aggregation_profile module¶

class hyperaggregate.aggregation_profiles.abstract_aggregation_profile.AbstractAggregationProfile¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Base class for secure aggregation logic and handling data sent over network

abstract aggregate(prepared_shares)¶

Aggregates shares (in form of prepared data) into single unit of data

Parameters

prepared_shares (list(object)) – list of data shares in the form ready to be sent over network

Returns

The aggregate of shares in the form ready to be sent over network

Return type

object

abstract create_shares_on_prepared_data(prepared_data, num_shares)¶

Creates shares on data already prepared for transfer over network

Parameters

  • prepared_data (object) – Data in the form ready to be sent over network

  • num_shares (int) – Number of shares to split data into

Returns

List of data shares in the form ready to be sent over network

Return type

list(object)

abstract prepare(data)¶

Prepares data into form ready for sending over network

Returns

Data prepared for sending over network

Return type

object

abstract unprepare(prepared_data)¶

Transform data received over network into the form usable by the application

Parameters

prepared_data (object) – Data in the form ready to be sent over network

Returns

Data in the form which application can use

Return type

object

Module contents¶

Implements basis for classes specifying concrete aggregation logic. Also, provides concrete implementations for some logics used throughout the rest of the code
